summary: Use diferent types of ore to create variations of one item.
descriptionHtml:
(I speak spanish, sorry for any wrong spelling)

For now, you can only create the steel sword model using diferent materials: 

- Ebony
- Malachite 
- Dwarven metal
- Orichalcum 
- Moonstone + quicksilver (just like elven equipment).

My intention is to create diferent armours/weapons of one especific model but using diferent materials. Create for example Elven armour with silver ingots or Dwarven armor with ebony ingots, each with their own lore-friendly textures, stats and recipies.

If there\'s anything wrong on the stats maybe, tell me, but I\'m not sure I might fix everything... this is very time consuming.

I just began working on this. Like I said, It\'s VERY time consuming, but I\'ll try to repeat the process at least for basic equipment (iron, steel, silver...)
author: E Zhertin
